name: out of control (itch) (understone)
description:
out of control big city life

Get ready to hit the streets as a taxi driver in ‚Out of Control‘! It‘s a race against time to navigate the city and pick up fares before your customer‘s wallet is as empty as your gas tank. Just remember, the only thing more important than getting to your destination is getting paid!

Two players team up to navigate the city as a taxi driver and navigator duo. The taxi driver plays on the computer, while the navigator uses playing cards to figure out the correct intersection exits. The driver knows the destination but not the way, while the navigator knows the direction but not the driver's location. With limited info and no view of each other's game, the pair must work together to reach the goal before the time runs out. Will you make it to the end, or end up hopelessly lost in the city's maze of streets?

Gamerules

• As the taxi driver, your job is to find the destination, but you have no idea where you're going. You only know your starting point.

• You'll navigate by the colors of buildings, parks, and monuments at each intersection. Good luck!

• The navigator will help you find the way, but he will need your description to find the correct card!

• The clock is ticking - you must get to the goal before the taximeter runs out!

• Remember, you can only see your part of the game, so don't withhold, skip, or lose control!

• Controls:
W-A-S-D: Drive taxi
Space: Brake
E: Sound horn
P: Pause game

This is a game created for the Dung GameJam with the theme of ‚You can't control the player'. Music by Bruno Belotti.
